children.name: Layer 1 : Road network and traffic guidance objects
children.description: Includes Roadwork geometry, Road shoulders and sidewalks, Parking spaces, Road markings, Traffic signs and traffic lights, Intersections, Pedestrian crossing, Bicycle lane, Speed bumps

children.name: Layer 2 : Roadside structures and permanent furniture
children.description: Includes Buildings, Tunnels, Bridges, Road side furniture : bench, bus station, Vegetation (grass, trees, bushes), Safety furniture: guardrails, construction plot, barrier, concrete separator, Street lamps, Road signs: advertising boards and pillars

children.name: Layer 3 : Temporary modification of Level1 and Level2
children.description: Includes Roadwork signs, Temporary road marking, Covered road marking, Fallen branch and tree on the road surface, Pothole, Speed bump

children.name: Layer 4 : Static and dynamic modeling
children.description: Includes Vehicles (moving and non moving): conventional car, pick-up, shuttle, bus, truck (with or without trailer), Vulnerable (pedestrian, cyclist, motorcyclist), Animals (flying, walking), Moving objects (box, tree, falling, flying leave and papers, ball, beverage can,...), Static objects (box, tree and branch, leave, ball, beverage can,...), Ground truth: observers, mask, bounding boxes

children.name: Layer 5 : Environment conditions and disturbers
children.description: Includes Adverse and degraded conditions: Rain, snow, fog, dust, Energy sources: sun, lamp, heat, electromagnetic wave, front headlight, Wind, Shadows and cloud effect, Specific effect on material (environment reflection,...)

children.name: Layer 6 : Digital information and sensors
children.description: Includes State of traffic lights and switchable traffic signs, Variable message sign, V2X messages, Cellular network coverage, Infra sensors (LiDAR, RADAR, camera (IR, neuromorphic, cyclop, fisheye,...)), GPS and satellite constellation (ref station), Road Side Unit, Meteo station

newClass.label: Type of environment modeling (trajectory, area with constraints, graph)
Definition of the limit of usability
Type of generated trajectory, path, manoeuvers
Limits of the trajectory modeling (max curvature)

children.name: Maneuvers type
children.description: Maneuvers the ego vehicle can perform

children.name: Tire state
children.description: For Tire grip : 0.5-1 (Mu value), for Tire pressure : in bar, for Slippage rate G : in %

children.name: Vehicle body (size)
children.description: For each dimension, please provide the value in centimeters
